data.title: Rowan Atkinson - Latest news, views, gossip, photos and video
data.meta_description: Get the latest news on Rowan Atkinson from Mail Online.
data.text:
Where are the stars of Four Weddings and a Funeral now? It's now 30 years since romcom classic hit cinemas... so what are the legendary cast up to now?

It was the low-budget comedy that proved a mega box office hit. And 30 years on from its 1994 release, Four Weddings and a Funeral remains one of the most iconic British romcoms of all time.

Boycie in Belgrade and Mr Bean in Beijing! How some of our best-loved shows from Only Fools and Horses to Alan Titchmarsh are HUGE hits in the most unlikely destinations

Alan Titchmarsh is the latest British entertainment legend to have become a hit in unlikely locations, following in the footsteps of the likes of Norman Wisdom, John Challis and Rowan Atkinson.

EMMA COWING: This law isn't an attack on hate... it's an attack on our very freedom

Creativity and provocation have been some of the most important values in the Scottish arts. Our artists need their creative freedom. And the rest of us would rather like it, too.

Frank Skinner? 'Too explicit'. Rowan Atkinson? 'A show-off'. Jimmy Tarbuck gives his uncensored views on today's British comedy giants - and the last man standing from his generation doesn't pull his punches!

Ahead of his first stand-up tour since pre-Covid times, UK comedian Jimmy Tarbuck, 84, opens up about his schooldays with John Lennon, his showbiz friends and what he really thinks of today's comics.

Will theatres' plays fall of Humza's hate crime laws?

Scotland's national theatre company is to hold talks with the SNP Government amid fears that new hate crime laws are a threat to artistic freedom.

Rowan Atkinson, 69, is 'set to make a huge comeback in one of his most iconic roles after a six-year absence'

Rowan Atkinson, 69, is reportedly set to reprise this iconic role for the first time in six years, it has been revealed this week.

Mr Bean was right...electric cars are dull to drive! Owners say rising insurance, scrapping of incentives and subsidies and 'soullessness' are forcing them to pull the plug on driving EVs

EXCLUSIVE: EV drivers fumed how their electric vehicles have dropped in value, charging costs have soared and incentives have been scrapped.

Is the public's love affair with electric cars over? As House of Lords committee hears a comedian is to blame for green motor sales stall, charging points across the UK lie empty and EV forecasts are missed - so who IS to blame?

A House of Lords committee report released yesterday said EV sales are 'stalling' among private motorists as many cannot afford them and because of the slow roll-out of public chargers.

Mr Bean is blamed for slump in electric car sales: House of Lords hears Rowan Atkinson is accused of 'damaging' public perception of EVs after describing the vehicles as a 'bit soulless'

Rowan Atkinson, 69, (pictured) described electric cars as 'a bit soulless' in a comment piece he penned in June last year.

Slew of TV shows and movies from Mean Girls to Sexy Beast keep being rehashed again and again as studios prioritise 'making money' from 'safe' projects

Some of the most in-demand viewings across the US and the UK - which have had fans in a frenzy - have had multiple iterations.

IAN HERBERT: Don't dismiss darts as a joke because fans dress as nuns or bananas. There are 10 million reasons why it's great TV

IAN HERBERT: The PDC transforms the Ally Pally into a place where Oompa Loompas, nuns and bottles of tomato ketchup sing 'Stand up if you love the darts

Inside Britain's most remote mainland pub - accessible only by a 40km hike over wild mountainous terrain or a six-mile ferry trip (but the fish and chips is worth the effort)

The Old Forge on the Knoydart peninsula in Scotland is in a village with no roads in or out. So it has a captive market. But Ted Thornhill discovers that it doesn't rest on its laurels...

Revealed: From snow globes to cranberry sauce, the Christmas items you should AVOID packing in your carry-on luggage - and why you shouldn't wrap gifts before flying

To ensure that all presents make it to the Christmas tree, London Luton Airport (LLA) is highlighting how carry-on rules apply to seasonal gifts and goodies.

The Perfume Shop employee is dubbed a 'queen' and 'instant icon' as she sends fans wild as she becomes an unlikely TikTok star after her gift-wrapping skills capture the attention of millions

The woman, who has been spotted in The Perfume Shop's Bluewater branch in Kent, has become a viral sensation after appearing in their TikTok videos.

People are only just discovering why Rowan Atkinson's Love Actually character took so long to wrap Alan Rickman's present

The perfect cosy movie to kick off the festive season, it turns out that one scene in British rom-com Love Actually (2003), which follows the relationships of eight London couples has a very interesting origin.

Timothee Chalamet takes in Lakers victory over Pacers at In-Season Tournament in Las Vegas... as he earns rave reviews for Wonka

The Los Angeles Lakers won the inaugural in-season tournament over the Philadelphia Pacers 123-129 in Las Vegas on Saturday night while Timothe Chalamet watched from courtside.

His scrumdiddlyumptious chocolate factory has delighted fans in two films. Now see how he made his dreams come true in a magical new prequel... WONKA'S BONKERS BEGINNINGS

Starring Timothe Chalamet in the title role, the new Wonka film, which also features a number of British A-listers, is a prequel exploring how Willy Wonka came to be the man he did.

Wonka fans brand film 'a whimsical treasure and delight'

Moviegoers have not been disappointed by Wonka after its theatre release on Friday which tells the origin story of Roald Dahl 's famous chocolatier.

Wonka fans brand film 'a whimsical treasure and delight' - with Timothee Chalamet's performance as the chocolatier enchanting moviegoers

Moviegoers have not been disappointed by Wonka after its theatre release on Friday which tells the origin story of Roald Dahl 's famous chocolatier.

The dark side of Roald Dahl's Willy Wonka: How Hollywood - including the latest film starring Timothee Chalamet - has glossed over the more sinister elements of the author's 1964 novel

Wonka-mania is about to unleash at cinemas but Dahl's original 1964 book wasn't quite so feel-good as the movie looks set to be - with descriptions of the Oompa-Loompas deemed racist.

Hugh Grant, 63, cosies up to wife Anna Elisabet Eberstein, 40, as he joins co-star Timothee Chalamet at the Wonka premiere in Paris

The iconic actor, 63, and his producer wife, 40, appeared as in love than ever as they attended the Wonka premiere in Paris.

Vanessa Bauer oozes elegance in a baby pink gown as she joins Hollywood's finest A-listers including Timothee Chalamet and Rowan Atkinson at the Wonka afterparty

Vanessa Bauer oozed elegance on Tuesday night as she joined some of Hollywood's biggest A-listers at the Wonka afterparty at the Royal Festival Hall in London.

Sophie Habboo puts on a leggy display in pink corset-style top as she joins dapper husband Jamie Laing at the Wonka premiere

Her top tied at the back and its ribbon trailed along after Sophie, 29, as she walked the red carpet lined with sweet-adorned Christmas trees.

Love Actually is set to return to cinemas this festive season to mark its 20th anniversary

To celebrate two decades since its release, Love Actually will return to cinemas this festive season.

Chelsea vs Tottenham preview: Mauricio Pochettino admits Spurs still hold a special place in his heart... but said he will park emotions for return to North London

Managing Chelsea looks enough to leave anyone in a muddle these days, but Mauricio Pochettino saw the funny side as he got his Atkinsons in a twist and thought Big Ron played Mr Bean.

Mr Bean icon Rowan Atkinson, 68, hints at new film as he heads to work at production office clutching some papers

The Mr Bean star, 68, made his way to Working Titles Films office which produces Johnny English.

Genie first trailer: Melissa McCarthy is nearly unrecognizable as a 2,000-year-old genie who must help a man win his family back before Christmas

Melissa McCarthy brings a magical slew of heart and humor to the first trailer for the holiday film Genie, which dropped on Wednesday from streaming giant Peacock. She plays a genie.

Jade Thirlwall is unrecognisable as she transforms into Mr Bean while boyfriend Jordan Stephens wears a Teddy suit for Halloween bash

The former Little Mix singer, 30, and the Rizzle Kicks star, 31, opted for a hilarious couples costume as they transformed into Mr Bean and Teddy.

EXCLUSIVE: Katherine Ryan reveals she's 'grateful' for backlash over her 'inappropriate' Beyonce joke as she weighs in on cancel culture in comedy

The Canadian star, 40, spoke out about backlash she's received to her jokes amid the ongoing debate about whether cancel culture is ruining comedy.

Australian Electoral Commissioner Tom Rogers' military past revealed after Voice referendum controversy

The row over crosses and ticks has blown up into the biggest controversy to hit the AEC since the commissioner took the helm to bring military precision to the operation 11 years ago.

Wonka cast were entirely submerged in 'enormous' tanks of chocolate that 'tasted every bit as good as they looked'

Paul King has said a specialist chocolatier made the 'enormous' tank of hot chocolate for the stars, including Timothee Chalamet as the title character, to 'immerse' themselves in.

The Tory wife who hit back at her husband's critics: Felicity Mercer reveals why she's taking no prisoners in her fight against trolls after vile Twitter attacks - led by Carol Vorderman - aimed at husband Johnny

REBECCA HARDY: You can say what you like about Johnny Mercer's wife Felicity - but you can't knock her sense of humour.

Wonka first trailer: Timothee Chalamet boldly takes on the 'Chocolate Cartel' to live out dream of becoming chocolatier... and HILARIOUSLY meets Hugh Grant as Oompa-Loompa

The 27-year-old actor portrays titular character in the two-and-a-half minute clip as he does all he can to live out his dream of becoming a chocolatier which even means taking on the 'chocolate cartel.'

Blackadder ...as you've never seen it before! The lost pilot for the hit sitcom has been unearthed for its 40th anniversary - and guess which Cold Feet star's in it!

Two new documentaries on Gold will feature the lost pilot - unearthed in the BBC archives - plus commentary from its stars and secrets from the UK's favourite sitcom's four series.

ROWAN ATKINSON: Our honeymoon with electric vehicles is over so, for now, my advice is to hang on to your old petrol motor

ROWAN ATKINSON: Sadly, keeping your old petrol car may be better than buying an EV. There are sound environmental reasons not to jump just yet.

How environmentally friendly are electric cars REALLY? As Rowan Atkinson claims he feels 'duped' by his motor, experts reveal how eco-friendly the vehicles are - and how they stack up against petrol versions

Scientists have responded to Rowan Atkinson's claims that 'keeping your old petrol car may be better than buying an electric vehicle'.

Unseen episode of 'funniest ever British sitcom' to air for the first time in 40 YEARS

The original and unseen pilot will air ahead of the show's 40th anniversary on UKTV channel Gold.

Blackadder stamps? Now that's a cunning plan! Beloved comedy's 40th anniversary to be celebrated with a special Royal Mail collection

Eight of the stamps capture moments from all four series of the classic sitcom from the mists of medieval England to the court of Queen Elizabeth I.

Dame Judi Dench is invited to King Charles' Coronation along with host of stars... after slamming The Crown for its 'unjust' depiction of the Royals

The actress, 88, is on the guest list for the Coronation of King Charles III on May 6, the Daily Mail's Richard Eden has disclosed.

Legendary BBC comedy set to RETURN for 40th anniversary festivities, star teases

Blackadder star Tony Robinson, 76, who played blundering Baldrick in the Eighties comedy, appeared on Lorraine, where he spoke to stand-in host Christine Lampard

'As soon as I started reading it, the character came back': Sir Tony Robinson shares delight over new Blackadder script - as he reprises his role as Baldrick for Comic Relief

The actor, 76, revealed Richard Curtis had sent him the script without an explanation so he began reading it to his wife Louise Hobbs.

Sir Tony Robinson speaks of his delight at reprising Blackadder character Baldrick for Comic Relief - but reveals why it would be impossible to do another series of the sitcom

Sir Tony Robinso, 76, has spoken of his delight at reprising his role as Blackadder dogsbody character Baldrick for Comic Relief.

Blackadder's Tony Robinson hints that Rowan Atkinson WILL in fact appear in Comic Relief comeback in major u-turn on decision

Blackadder's Tony Robinson has hinted that Rowan Atkinson may in fact appear in Comic Relief comeback after all.

'It just happens to be a script for Baldrick': Sir Tony Robinson addresses Rowan Atkinson's absence from new Blackadder skit for Comic Relief saying he 'always contributes' and will be there 'in some form or another'

Sir Tony said the 'beautifully crafted' script had been written for his character and that while Rowan Atkinson wouldn't be involved, he 'always contributes' to the charity appeal.

As Blackadder prepares to return some 34-years after THAT ending - how Rowan Atkinson and Tony Robinson have since charted similar romantic terrain with MUCH younger partners

Atkinson, now 68, is in a relationship with 41-year old comedian and actress Louise Ford, while Robinson, 76, is married to third wife Louise Hobbs - also 41.

Blackadder is set to make comeback for first time in over 20 years for Comic Relief special with Tony Robinson as Baldrick - but one major star WON'T be returning

Blackadder is officially set to make a comeback for first time in over 20 years for a Comic Relief 2023 special.

Jodie Kidd looks unrecognisable as she models '40s floral dress and Victory rolled hair while attending period themed Goodwood Revival with Rowan Atkinson

The pair were in attendance as car enthusiasts converged on the historic race meeting, the only sporting event of its kind to be staged entirely in a period theme.

Celebrity snapper reveals his most difficult encounters

A celebrity photographer revealed what his A-list subjects are really like, from difficult Rowan Atkinson to 'lovely' Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie.

'I wouldn't rule out filming more': Rowan Atkinson hints at a return for TV drama Maigret... which was dropped by ITV after just four episodes

The actor, 67, has hinted at a return for the 2016 whodunnit, which was dropped by ITV after just four episodes over two seasons.

'The job of comedy is to offend!' Rowan Atkinson says comedians should be allowed to make jokes about 'absolutely ANYTHING' as he rails against cancel culture

The Mr Bean star, 67, said the purpose of comedy was to 'have the potential to offend' and argued that humour is made to make someone look 'ridiculous'.

From Mr Bean to... Mr Bee! Master of slapstick Rowan Atkinson is at it again in his new Netflix show - one man's battle of wits with a bumblebee

British actor Rowan Atkinson stars in a new comedy Man Vs Bee, a ten-part series on Netflix, as Trevor, a man recruited to house-sit by an agency for wealthy strangers

EXCLUSIVE FIRST LOOK: Rowan Atkinson stars in new Netflix comedy Man Vs Bee as bumbling housesitting dad Trevor whose rivalry with an insect causes chaos

Rowan Atkinson makes his TV comeback starring in new Netflix comedy Man Vs Bee as bumbling housesitting dad Trevor whose rivalry with an insect causes chaos.

Rowan Atkinson upsets Cotswolds neighbours with fireworks for his girlfriend's 40th birthday party after terrified pets ran away and locals feared 'military base was under attack'

Dogs ran away from their homes and cats were reportedly left 'spooked' during the event at the Lucknam Park hotel and spa near Chippenham on Saturday, organised for actress Louise Ford's 40th.

Confessions of a celebrity snapper: Photographer Dave Benett shares insider stories about stars he's captured over the course of his 30-year career from difficult Sacha Baron Cohen to 'lovely' Beatrice and Eugenie

A celebrity photographer revealed what his A-list subjects are really like, from difficult Rowan Atkinson to 'lovely' Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie.

Beach hut that is just 10ft wide and has no running water or electricity is up for sale in Southwold for 250,000... double the price of three bedroom terraced house 10 miles away

A beach hut on the promenade of the upmarket seaside town Southwold in Suffolk, Doset, which is famed for its celebrity visitors has gone on the market for a record 250,000.

Naomi! Claudia! Diana! Celebrity photographer Dave Benett's VERY glamorous snaps of A-listers partying and gossiping at glitzy bashes go on display in London

A new exhibition opened in London last night celebrating the work of Dave Benett, who's photographed everyone who's anyone from the last 30 years.

Confessions of a celebrity snapper: Photographer Dave Benett shares insider stories about stars he's captured over the course of his 30-year career from difficult Sacha Baron Cohen to 'lovely' Beatrice and Eugenie

A celebrity photographer has revealed what his A-list subjects are really like, from difficult Rowan Atkinson to 'lovely' Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie.

Confessions of a celebrity snapper: Photographer Dave Benett shares insider stories about stars he's captured over the course of his 30-year career from difficult Sacha Baron Cohen to 'lovely' Beatrice and Eugenie

Dave Benett, 64, who worked his way up from a Fleet Street assistant to one of Britain's most prolific society photographers, shared stories from his career with The Times.

Mr Bean star Rowan Atkinson finally moves into 5m 'space age petrol station' mansion following decade-long planning row - 16 years after buying land for 2.6m

Rowan Atkinson has reportedly finally moved into his 'space age petrol station' mansion after a decade-long planning row with neighbours.

Olivia Colman trades her crown for candy as she, Rowan Atkinson and Sally Hawkins join the cast of the upcoming Willy Wonka origin story starring Timothee Chalamet

The Crown's Olivia Colman will be joining the cast of the upcoming Willy Wonka origin story along with Rowan Atkinson and Sally Hawkins, Variety reported on Wednesday.

Mr Bean star Rowan Atkinson shows off longer hair as he shoots scenes on location in Aylesbury for new Netflix series Man Vs Bee

Rowan Atkinson was on location on Wednesday filming his new Netflix comedy Man Vs Bee.

Rowan Atkinson, 66, steps outside in a blue dressing gown as he strolls around set of upcoming Netflix comedy series Man vs Bee

Rowan Atkinson, 66, was spotted wearing a dressing gown on the set of upcoming Netflix series Man vs Bee on Wednesday after signing up to work on the project last year.

Never-before-seen photos of a young Rowan Atkinson showing off his comic genius at the Edinburgh Festival are released to mark the 30th anniversary of Mr Bean

New photographs have emerged for the first time which show the very earliest outings of Atkinson's most famous creation which he has described as 'a child in a grown man's body'.

'Cancel culture is like a medieval mob': Rowan Atkinson blasts social media and blames it for widening divisions in society

Rowan Atkinson, best known for his roles as Blackadder and Mr Bean, said social media fills him with 'fear about the future' - and that it has widened divisions in society and lowered tolerance.

'The weight of responsibility is not pleasant': Rowan Atkinson finds Mr Bean 'stressful and exhausting' and hints he will never play role again

The actor, 65, has played the title character in a successful series since 1990 until 1995, with a film Mr Bean's Holiday in 2007, but now admitted he finds the role 'stressful and exhausting'.

The revenge of Mr Bean! Rowan Atkinson's tweed-jacket wearing oddball becomes social media phenomenon with 99 MILLION Facebook followers (ahead of even Justin Bieber and Rihanna)

The iconic character Mr Bean, played by actor Rowan Atkinson, has become one of the most successful brands in digital media after racking up 99 million followers on Facebook.

Rowan Atkinson's lookalike son Ben, 26, joins the Gurkhas after spending three months in Nepal

Rowan Atkinson's lookalike son has joined the Gurkhas after spending three months in Nepal. The 26-year-old will have to learn Nepalese in his new role.

Rowan Atkinson is joined by his pet dog as he heads out for shopping in London... after former co-star Tony Robinson insisted Blackadder will NOT return for a fifth series

The celebrated actor, 64, was joined by his pet dog as he ventured out for some shopping in the capital.

Rowan Atkinson is 'extremely excited' for return of Blackadder as cast 'discuss fifth series set in the modern era at secret meeting'

Rowan Atkinson has told friends he is 'excited' to return to his role as Edmund Blackadder in a rumoured reboot of the cult comedy classic.

Comedian James Acaster 'found out his girlfriend Louise Ford, 36, had dumped him for Rowan Atkinson, 64, by reading it in the newspaper'

Comedian James Acaster has revealed he found out his girlfriend Louise Ford had dumped him for Rowan Atkinson by reading it in the newspaper.

Rowan Atkinson, 64, 'to take a year off from acting to look after his youngest daughter while his girlfriend Louise Ford, 35, focuses on her acting career'

The Mr Bean star, 64, is father to Ben and Lily with ex-wife Sunetra Sastry while his girlfriend Louise Ford, 35, gave birth to daughter Isla in December 2017.

Rowan Atkinson admits he doubts he'll play iconic character Mr Bean again as he's done all that he can in the role... but coyly adds 'never say never'

It was one of his most iconic characters, who shot to stardom around the world in the nineties thanks to his comedic charm.

Rowan Atkinson, 63, and daughter Lily, 23, quash rumours of a fall-out as they celebrate Johnny English Strikes Again premiere at film's afterparty

The actor's daughter Lily Sastry proved to be his number one fan as they celebrated the premiere of his latest film Johnny English Strikes Again at an after-party in London on Wednesday night.

Olga Kurylenko wows in feathered crop top and lilac trousers as she joins Rowan Atkinson at Johnny English Strikes Again screening in London

The James Bond star, 38, turned heads as she attended a special screening of Johnny English Strikes Again with co-star Rowan Atkinson at London's Curzon Mayfair Cinema on Wednesday.

Mr Bean actor Rowan Atkinson wades into UK burka row as he urges the ex-Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson NOT to say sorry for saying burka wearers look like letterboxes

Atkinson (pictured) said: 'As a lifelong beneficiary of the freedom to make jokes about religion, I do think that Boris Johnson's joke about wearers of the burka resembling letterboxes is a pretty good one.'

Rowan Atkinson net worth revealed after death hoax

The Rowan Atkinson death hoax has emerged again in the form of a breaking news story, suggesting that the Mr Bean actor died in a car crash after a stunt had gone wrong.
